# Fayl nomi: .github/workflows/render-report.yml

name: Render Quarto Report

on:
  # Har 10 daqiqada ishga tushirish uchun
  schedule:
    - cron: '*/10 * * * *'
  # Qo'lda ishga tushirish imkoniyatini qo'shish
  workflow_dispatch:

jobs:
  render-and-commit:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - name: Fayllarni ko'chirib olish
        uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - name: Quarto va R'ni sozlash
        uses: r-lib/actions/setup-r@v2
        with:
          r-version: '4.3' # O'zingizga mos R versiyasini kiriting
      - uses: quarto-dev/quarto-actions/setup@v2

      - name: R paketlarini o'rnatish
        run: |
          install.packages(c('httr', 'jsonlite', 'dplyr', 'ggplot2', 'DT', 'lubridate', 'leaflet', 'tidyr', 'gt'))
        shell: Rscript {0}

      - name: Hisobotni render qilish (qayta yaratish)
        run: |
          quarto render analyse_daily.qmd --to html
        shell: bash
        # YUQORIDAGI QATORDA "analyse_daily.qmd" O'RNIGA O'Z FAYLINGIZ NOMINI YOZING

      - name: O'zgarishlarni GitHub'ga yuklash
        run: |
          git config --local user.email "actions@github.com"
          git config --local user.name "GitHub Actions"
          git add --all
          # Agar o'zgarish bo'lsa, commit qiladi
          git commit -m "Hisobot avtomatik yangilandi" || echo "O'zgarishlar yo'q"
          git push || echo "Yangi o'zgarishlar yo'q"
